text: Nakanoshima Station (中之島駅,なかのしまえき) is a railway station of Keihan Electric Railway in Kita-ku, Osaka, Japan. The station name occasionally accompanies the secondary name Osaka International Convention Center. == Nearby stations == ; Keihan Electric Railway : Nakanoshima Line :: Nakanoshima - Watanabebashi ==Other websites== * Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Osaka
title: Nakanoshima Station (Osaka)
